website_summaries.verdict: An affordable pick for riders seeking a larger skateboard for tricks or gifting.
pros: Does not take long to break in
Lightweight board despite the larger design
Trucks and wheels are made for avid skaters
cons: Wheels tend to work better on smooth surfaces
Some owners reported problems with shipping

customer_reviews.title: The Wheel wasn't aligned
customer_reviews.text: The One of the wheels wasn't aligned to other three wheels, so we returned it. It didn't touch the ground.
customer_reviews.author: KRUNAL PARMAR

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great board for both my 8 year old and 11 year old. Good quality and great price!
customer_reviews.author: LoriL9182

customer_reviews.title: Great starter stake board for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great starter skateboard. Thicker wheels would’ve better for street usage but it’s not an issue. My daughter uses it often and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Haq

customer_reviews.title: Great Skateboard
customer_reviews.text: Awesome skateboard for beginners and long time skaters alike. The grip on the board is excellent. Overallgreat purchess.
customer_reviews.author: rosy

customer_reviews.title: Wheel came off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a birthday present over a month ago but it wasn't used until today. Wheel fell off with less than an hours worth of use with an amateur riding it. Can't return because part return date. What a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Griffin

customer_reviews.title: First skateboard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, first skateboard, my son liked the design and it rolls good on smooth surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: maureen thiele

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Skate board arrived in perfect condition and my son loves it. He rides it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Good board for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: The board is sturdy and the grip was really good.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10 year old son and he enjoys riding it l.
customer_reviews.author: Radha

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for myself after telling my nephew I’d learn to skateboard with him. Overall, it’s served it’s purpose. I’ve learned how to get on and can do a little coasting. The skate is a little wobbly though. Also a friend tried to flip it and it slightly cracked. After comparing with my nephew’s board I’d say that if you’re looking for something for the long term, go to an actual shop that specializes in boards: it’s worth the investment. Overall though I’m pretty happy with what I’ve been able to learn with this skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: Annabella A. Cruz

product_meta.title: Kryptonics Star Series 31 Inch
feature_bullets: COMPLETE SKATEBOARD: 31-in. skateboard with a thick, durable 9-ply pro concave maple wood deck
DESIGN MINDED: Double kicktail design provides greater control, allows for wide range of tricks, and easy braking
SMOOTH RIDE: 54mm x 33mm, PU Injected polyurethane wheels with traction grooves, 80Ab standard grip tape, and carbon steel ABEC 3 bearings deliver a smooth ride on any surface!
DURABLE: Heavy Duty 5 inch aluminum Krypto "Beast" trucks with an all stone finish support higher weight and faster speed
AGE AND WEIGHT: Recommended for ages 8 years and older, supports weight up to 220 lbs.
